summary: This is my first spell mod and i wish that i would get good comments about it sry my bad english, and sry that i didn\'t upload any pictures, i promise that its awesome!
descriptionHtml:
This spell can be bought from i think anyone who sell conjuring spelltomes and i have confirmed that Farengar sells this one.
Spell will summon frost kind dragon to help you in fight for 1 minute and it will breath frost.
Spell will take 3,5 sec to cast so that kinda makes it not so OP
This mod adds new spell in game
author: Prowhey
